resources.string:
- Some of the features of this app can cause unstability and, in rare case, the brick of the device. These tweaks are supposed, and tested, to works on almost every device running Android 4.0+. 

- Avoid playing with this app. Most of the features proposed can touch and change the behavior of your system, so, you should use it with brain. 

- This app doesn't root your device, however, we added a panel to help you find instruction about how to root your device.
